医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
国家散步日鼓励运动改善健康根据疾病控制和预防中心的说法，久坐的行为已成为一场国家健康危机，每天四分之一的成年人每天坐超过八个小时，增加了他们患心脏病，中风和心理健康挑战的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/national-walking-day-encourages-movement-for-better-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/national-walking-day-encourages-movement-for-better-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B1848C8B-60D5-49AA-9B97B97-D9B5DDDD222A Wed, 02 Apr 2025 21:33:37 -0400 National Walking Day encourages movement for better health
研究揭示了现实世界中低碳水化合物饮食中隐藏的心血管风险研究人员检查了现实世界中的低碳水化合物高脂（LCHF）饮食人群，以评估营养摄入量与心血管风险之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-reveals-hidded-cardiovascular-cardiscular----------------in-real-world-world-low-low-carb-diets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/study-reveals-hidded-cardiascular-cardiascular-risks-in-real-world-world-low-low-carb-diets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4bdd551-549d-4bea-a411-fb7c682a12d3 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 20:59:00 -0400 Study reveals hidden cardiovascular risks in real-world low-carb diets
素食可能会阻碍健康的衰老 - 除非饮食质量很高遵循素食的年长中国成年人的健康状况较小。但是，对于那些食用高质量植物性饮食的人来说，这种劣势消失了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/vegetarian-diets-may-hinder-healthy-agingee28094 nunless-diet-diet-diet-diet-quality-is-is-high.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/vegetarian-diets-may-hinder-healthy-agingee28094 nunless-diet-diet-diet-diet-quality-is-is-high.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0A0EA87B-1498-4034-AB49-3924CFBC0E6D Wed, 02 Apr 2025 20:38:00 -0400 Vegetarian diets may hinder healthy aging—unless diet quality is high

皮肤的微生物如何塑造免疫力，炎症和慢性皮肤疾病皮肤微生物的作用不仅仅是共存 - 它们塑造免疫反应，修复组织并影响整个寿命的基因表达。这篇综述说明了这种微生物 - 免疫对话中的破坏如何导致湿疹，牛皮癣或痤疮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/how-your-skine28099s-microbes-shape-immunity-inflammation-inflammation-and-chronic-skin-skin-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/how-your-skine28099s-microbes-shape-immunity-inflammation-inflammation-and-chronic-skin-skin-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ABF3223-FABE-41D0-B657-2296FC37D072 Wed, 02 Apr 2025 19:26:00 -0400 How your skin’s microbes shape immunity, inflammation, and chronic skin disease
FGFR2被确定为KRAS突变胰腺癌进展的关键驱动力癌前胰腺病变和一些携带KRAS突变的胰腺导管腺癌（PDAC）肿瘤的FGFR2蛋白的表达高于正常表达，FGFR2失活延迟了小鼠中的KRAS-KRAS突变PDAC发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/fgfr2-sideified-sendified-askey-key-driver-in-kras-in-kras-mutated-pancreatic-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/fgfr2-sideified-side-s-key-key-driver-in-kras-in-kras-mutated-pancreatic-cancer-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c61b569d-360c-48cd-80E7-1653945AA28F Wed, 02 Apr 2025 15:05:02 -0400 FGFR2 identified as key driver in KRAS-mutated pancreatic cancer progression

运动后老年人的肌肉酸痛较少根据研究，老年人经历了较少的肌肉酸痛，这推翻了人们普遍认为，衰老肌肉的弹性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/older-Adults-ecperience-experience-muscle-muscle-sorness-sorness-soreness-after-eccise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250402/older-Adults-experience-muscle-muscle-muscle-sorness-soreness-after-exercise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8230A217-CB66-4CB5-A4C8-C7CA81F0A7AA Wed, 02 Apr 2025 14:52:40 -0400 Older adults experience less muscle soreness after exercise
